attributes.action: Break the naval blockade on Gaza in order to deliver humanitarian aid.
attributes.additional_details: Because verbal condemnations and calls for negotiations will not convince the current Israeli government to lift their blockade.  Direct unilateral action is the only credible means of preventing a humanitarian catastrophe.
attributes.background: Assemble an international coalition to break the Israeli naval blockade on Gaza in order to deliver humanitarian aid, deploying military vessels as a deterrent against Israeli countermeasures.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729861
